sections: This 2011 Porsche 911 Speedster is #175 of 356 total examples produced, approximately 100 of which were designated for the US market.
is a special German sports car. Every inch of the car is built for driving, although this one has only been driven 1300 miles, so it’s basically brand new. Thanks to
, you can own this rare Porsche, but don’t sleep on the opportunity.

is a naturally aspirated 3.8-liter flat-six cylinder engine. It is a powertrain shared with the contemporary Carrera GTS and features a Porsche Exclusive Powerkit. The engine exhales through a Sports Exhaust system with black finished pipes. This setup is factory rated as having an output of 408-horsepower and 310 lbs-ft of torque.

the engine through a seven-speed PDK dual-clutch transaxle with a limited-slip differential. It gets stopping power from Porsche Ceramic Composite Brakes, and rolls on 19-inch Sport Classic wheels. It is loaded with options and is ready to be driven.
is well-known as an award-winning, top seller (
) on Bring a Trailer. We provide turnkey auction management for our clients.

presents cars in an unparalleled fashion, with a comprehensive history, descriptions, photos, and video for each vehicle. We want to put buyers in the virtual driver’s seat so they can experience a vehicle as if they were present, giving them confidence in their purchase.
